articles.author: Jasper Jolly
articles.title: European gas prices fall to pre-Ukraine war level - The Guardian
articles.description: Milder winter, alternative imports and energy reduction cuts demand after Russian invasion pushed up prices
articles.content:
European gas prices have dipped to a level last seen before Russia launched its invasion of Ukraine in February, after warmer weather across the continent eased concerns over shortages.
The month-ah… [+3680 chars]

articles.author: Mariyan Slavov
articles.title: Redmi K60 might come to Europe as the Poco F5 Pro, according to Polish leaker - PhoneArena
articles.description: According to a tweet from MIUI Polska writer Kacper Skrzypek (his track record is unclear), the Redmi K60 will be called the Poco F5 Pro when it is released in global markets.
articles.content: Furthermore, the series comes with a 64MP+8MP+2MP camera system and a base price of 2,499 yuan (around $359) in China. According to Skrzypek, the price in Europe will be a bit different, and the alle… [+692 chars]

articles.title: The Jewish lawyer-turned-comic-turned-president behind... - Daily Maverick
articles.description: Extraordinary times in Eastern Europe deliver both the good guy and the villain of a dramatic year. Volodymyr Zelensky emerged clearly as the claimant of international hero status.
